carousels.title: Pinayagan Norte
carousels.detail: We envision the Barangay Pinayagan Norte to be more progressive, loving and peaceful place to live in where people and residents enjoy harmonious way of life and business.

carousels.title: Pinayagan Norte
carousels.detail: As a primary planning and implementing unit, the barangay is mandated to plan development projects and programs and implement government policies and activities in the community.

carousels.title: Pinayagan Norte
carousels.detail: We will build a healthy and diverse community by pooling our resources, sharing our skills and working cooperatively.
